monogr.title: The Christian East – Its Institutions and its Thought: A Critical Reflection. Papers of the International Scholarly Congress for the 75th Anniversary of the Pontifical Oriental Institute, Rome, 30 May – 5 June 1993

body.bibl: Bernabò, Massimo. “Tradizioni Siriache Nelle Miniature Ottateuchi Bizantini.” In The Christian East – Its Institutions and Its Thought: A Critical Reflection. Papers of the International Scholarly Congress for the 75th Anniversary of the Pontifical Oriental Institute, Rome, 30 May – 5 June 1993, edited by Robert F. Taft, 299–311. Orientalia Christiana Analecta 251. Rome: Pontificium Institutum Orientalium Studiorum, 1996.
